channel.title: [paypal] need help - experienced coder [20$]
channel.description:
Hello.
I have a server hosted on soho vps from ucvhost 3gb RAM.
Yet i'm hosting about 40 players (we're brand new)
We keep dcing well once in an hour, most of the time its not a whole "DC" but like 18-55% of the server that lags out, rest just screen freeze, for a maximum of 14 seconds
I guess its some kind of cycle handling that lags it out? I removed my announcements already
I thought the " [player-#] Fatal : couldn't find connection vertex: Dropping packet " was the error, fixed most of it and it still happens, and yeah.
Then i thought it was the " [ Player-#] invalid waypoint in walking queue "
Or sometimes i get " java.lang.Arrayoutofbounds"
Also two unHandled packets but i don't think those would DC a server.
But when it dc's, most of the time, none of theses appears, it just dc's, and the vps is pure BLACK, like when i try to 'browse' the vps screen, it just doesnt work until the " lag" is done.
It is not the providing because its a verified compagny, and i know my public void main is kinda off, well can anyone check it out? I'll give 20$ to whoever FIXES it, if you try and fail , too bad.
The source is EXILIUM PI/DSPK, I heard it's based to deathly pvpz but it's not really similar.
I also removed a zombie minigame that, i thought it caused lag
THANKS FOR FEEDBACK
** I'll post any files you request **
THIS IS WORTH IT!
This happened with the original source , so you can download the mopar source if you might want to test, i wont give you my game but screenshare\teamview only
**note. Didnt lag with my own computer when hosting, but its dual processing 16gb ram
